attributes.action: Remove Tottenham from the Premier League because they are not worth the it.
attributes.additional_details:
As a football fan I believe it is a commplete joke that Tottenham get to play in the Premier League. For years they have said that they will be a good team but time after time they fail.

They have had 1 good season by their standards and it won't get any better so I think they should be removed from the league to stop any further embarrassment to London and there fans.
